========================================
adbgui -- A  adb Gui based on pyFormUI
========================================
#### 1.install wxpython
```bash
  sudo apt-get install python-wxtools
```
#### 2.Run ADBGui.py
```bash
  python ADBGui.py 
```

#### 3.luanch Functions by Menu
